title: If the land reserved as per the DP is acquired by MCGM/Appropriate Authority, the Owner shall be entitled for the grant of TDR as per Regulation No 32 or monetary compensation
clause_text: If the land reserved as per the DP is acquired by MCGM/Appropriate Authority, the Owner shall be entitled for the grant of TDR as per Regulation No 32 or monetary compensation.

source_pdf.text_snippet: If the land reserved as per the DP is acquired by MCGM/Appropriate Authority, the Owner shall be entitled for the grant of TDR as per Regulation No 32 or monetary compensation.
